casebody.data:
MARYLAND-NATIONAL CAPITAL PARK AND PLANNING COMMISSION, petitioner,
v.
AMERICAN HUMANIST ASSOCIATION, et al. No. 18-18. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 2, 2018.

*452Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
